issue.title: Atlas drifting while seated in car

content.raw:
John, Steven,

Attached are two plots comparing drift while the robot is standing on the seat vs. on the ground, using our controller. Whereas drift is negligible when standing on the ground, it is quite significant when standing on the seat.

Twan
